Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Main class of the game. This class represents the board and can handle request from incoming users. Both player has the same reference of the board, and the board knows both players.
Author:
Florian RICHARD, Julien MONTEIL

  • Field Details

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(java.util.ArrayList<model.Hole> holes)

  • Method Details

    • setPlayer

      public int setPlayer​(model.Player player)
      Set playerOne and playerTwo of the board. The first player to connect to the server will be the playerOne. The second will be set to player two. The first player to play is chosen randomly. When the second player is set the board is full so isNotFull is set to false.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that will be set.
      Returns:
      the number of the player (1 or 2)

    • handleATurn

      public void handleATurn​(model.Player player, java.lang.String input)
      Function that is used as a controller of client inputs. It is called by each player when they want to interact with the server. Request are JSON string that is parsed with the ClientInputController. See more detail in ClientInputControllerDocumentation.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is actually playing.
      input - the request of the player.
      out - the output stream of the player.
      See Also:
      ClientInputController

    • handleWin

      public boolean handleWin​(model.Player player, boolean isSurrend)
      Handle the end of a round and check if the game is over. This function will make the actual player and it's enemy waiting for a confirmation to continue playing.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is playing.
      isSurrend - specifies if the round has been won by surrending or not.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the game is over.

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver​(model.Player player)
      Handles the end of a game, when 6 round has been played. It sends appropriate messages to each player regarding if the match is null, won or lose. Write the score in the score File.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the player that end the game by playing.

    • saveScore

      public java.lang.String saveScore​(model.Player p)
      save actual the winner number of seeds in score.txt file. Return the sorted list of score
      Parameters:
      p -

    • isNullRound

      public boolean isNullRound()
      Check if the round is a null.
      Returns:
      true if the round is null.

    • loadFromRequest

      public void loadFromRequest​(model.ClientInputController request)
      Load a board from the client request. It repopulates every elements of the board.
      Parameters:
      request - the request sent by the client.

    • distribute

      public int distribute​(int holeIndex)
      Distributes seeds from the played hole.
      Parameters:
      holeIndex - the hole played by the player
      Returns:
      the index of the hole where the last seed goes.

    • broadcastMsg

      public void broadcastMsg​(java.lang.String msg)
      Send a message to both players.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to send to players.

    • getSeeds

      public int getSeeds()
      Get the total number of seeds in board holes(excepted granaries).
      Returns:
      the number of seeds in the board.

    • resetBoard

      public void resetBoard​(model.Player p)
      This function resets the board. It set holes and granary to default values, set player's score and the number of round played to 0. The it set's readyForNewGame to 0, players will have to wait each other.
      Parameters:
      p - the player that is playing.

    • emptyBoard

      public void emptyBoard()
      Empty the board by reseting holes and granaries.

    • emptyGranaries

      public void emptyGranaries()
      Empty both players' granary.

    • getBoardToJSONString

      public static java.lang.String getBoardToJSONString​(Board b, model.Player p, boolean confirmation)
      Creates a JSON string representation of the actual board.
      Parameters:
      b - the board to represent in JSON.
      Returns:
      the JSON string.
